The `RotatingLog` class serves as an enhanced file handler that automatically rotates log files when they exceed specified size or time limits. It ensures log management by creating new files as needed, preventing single files from becoming too large or outdated beyond defined intervals.

class RotatingLog:
    """
    An `open()` replacement that will automatically open and write
    to a new file if the prior file is too large or after a time interval.
    """
